reviews.customers_say: Customers find the turtlenecks comfortable and appreciate that they keep their neck warm under sweaters and sweatshirts.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Style is simple. it will fit any shirt or dress so the functionality is perfect!
items.body: perfect for the low V necks i seem to always get, a pin or two keeps people from looking down my shirts or dresses. since they are solid colors, I don't have to sit here and color match patterns. Not to thick not to thin, good fabric as well as durable. Style is simple. it will fit any shirt or dress so the functionality is perfect! Read more
items.author: Ladydarksky®

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Completes the Outfit
items.body: The “red” dickie is more orange than represented in the picture. Otherwise, they are comfortable and have good coverage. I’m pleased with the purchase. Read more
items.author: gail

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stretch bands that fit under your arms to keep dickie in place
items.body: Love all the colors. Really works if a turtle neck shirt is too much under a sweater. They have stretch bands that fit under your arms to keep it in place...a great idea. I only buy V neck sweaters so these look great. These are only half neck collars so if you want to be able to adjust the collar's height, these aren't for you. Read more
items.author: Doreen Bennett

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works for Ectomorphs ONLY
items.body: This chemisettes are too small. They do not work for endomorphs, and I doubt mesomorphs, either. You have to be an ectomorph for this to properly fit you. This is not a one-size fits all. Read more
items.author: Gateways

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars WARNING! WARNING!
items.body: These were made in China and that's the quality you get. They have elastic on the sides to hold them down(?) But good luck getting the back down. It takes 2 people to get this on and then when you do, they don't fit right. They are tight and the turtleneck part doesn't stand up; it "wrinkles" down sometimes it folds--hard to explain. These just aren't what you would hope them to be. UPDATE: These are not sized for everyone. While they are stretchy, they didn't stretch enough for me and consequently while trying to pull it down in the back, the elastic tore. I'm returning them. They were made in another country, Need I say more? Read more
items.author: Missy M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dickies
items.body: Nice! Still get the turtle neck look but not hot! Read more
items.author: Linda Gagliani

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not for large chested women
items.body: Thought these would be a good idea as I needed something to cover skin over collarbone after medical procedure. I am not flat chested and these are uncomfortable. They do not cover down to the bra line like shown in photo. They stop right in the middle :( but need them for a few weeks so guess I am stuck with them. Read more
items.author: Jdub

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Multi Color 12, Retro Color 5, Bright Colors 5, Classic Colors 5, Cool Color 5, Chic Color 12. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
